author: Matthew J. Belvedere
title: 'Just say no to IPO' — Cramer says new offerings are a bigger threat to the market than China
description: CNBC's Jim Cramer says that too many initial public offerings coming to Wall Street pose a greater risk to the stock market than the U.S.-China trade war.
content:
CNBC's Jim Cramer said on Monday that too many initial public offerings coming to Wall Street pose a greater risk to the stock market than the U.S.-China trade war.
"Just say no to IPO," Cramer said on "Squawk on the Street."
Earlier Monday morning, the "Ma… [+812 chars]
